text: Younger officially graduated from a love triangle to a love square on Wednesday's double whammy of an episode. In a game of relationship musical chairs, the TV Land series finally pushed forward the long - gestating relationship between Liza ( Sutton Foster ) and her boss Charles ( Peter Hermann ), as well as the percolating romance between Liza's ex Josh ( Nico Tortorella ) and best friend Kelsey ( Hilary Duff ). After Charles confessed his feelings to Liza the episode prior, his employee — who is posing as a twentysomething but is actually age - appropriate for forty - something Charles — acted on her uncontrollable sex fantasy and lunged, lips first, towards him. Their intended office romp, however, was interrupted by a janitor and never continued due to the unexpected arrival of a
